message.jmws.deletion_failure: Could not delete waypoint(s) on the server
message.jmws.creation_failure:
Could not create waypoint on the server.
It is recommended to delete the waypoint and try again.
message.jmws.creation_group_failure:
Could not create group on the server.
It is recommended to delete the group and try again.
message.jmws.deletion_group_failure: Could not delete group(s) on the server
message.jmws.local_group_upload: Added local group(s) to the server.
message.jmws.local_both_upload: Added local waypoint(s) and group(s) to the server.
message.jmws.world_is_local: Playing in single player. JMWS will be disabled for you and all clients.
text.config.jmws-config.title: JourneyMap Waypoint Syncing (JMWS)
text.config.jmws-config.option.showAlert: If waypoint creation, deletion or other alerts are shown
text.config.jmws-config.option.playEffec: If sound effects (usually from alerts) will play.
text.config.jmws-config.option.colouredT: If text will be coloured (e.g. successful action, failure)
text.config.jmws-config.option.clientCon: Frequency of when waypoints are grabbed from the server (in ticks)
How long until the mod determines that the server doesn't have JMWS installed
text.config.jmws-config.option.serverCon: How large a sync packet can be. Only editable by server.
If server has waypoint syncing enabled.
if server has group syncing enabled.
error.jmws.error_packet_size: You have too many waypoints and groups. Please delete some to continue making waypoints and syncing.
error.jmws.error_corrupted_waypoint: One or more waypoints or groups are corrupted. Contact administration for details.
error.jmws.jmws_not_installed: Server does not have JMWS installed. JMWS will be disabled.
warning.jmws.server_disabled_jmws: Server has JMWS, but has been disabled on server.
warning.jmws.server_disabled_group: Server has JMWS, but group syncing has been disabled.
warning.jmws.server_disabled_waypoint: Server has JMWS, but waypoint syncing has been disabled.
warning.jmws.world_is_local: Playing in single player. JMWS will be disabled for you and all clients.
warning.jmws.world_is_local_no_commands: Playing in single player. Some commands will not work.
